review: This device has been a god-send...goodbye cable/satellite. Between Prime and netflix we have watched more quality programming as a family in the last month than ever. It felt great turning in our cable boxes and we haven't looked back. The ease of setup and use is unparalled and the small footprint a welcome respite from the ugly receivers we coped with...we subscribed to all the big names over the years from cable to satellite to fiber...good riddance. Just bought one for my parents and am sure they'll soon kiss their satellite subscription goodbye.
author: Gerhayr Djahani

review: I've had the Amazon Fire for 7 months now. The Amazon Prime shows work great. The other apps it supposedly supports do no work. We have to unplug it daily for it to work as it should. I wouldn't purchase this again.
